verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <WH7200> tir-'Eh Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שׁ֨וֹר <WH7794> Shor ox אָחִ֜יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother's א֤וֹ <WH176> o or אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׂיוֹ֙ <WH7716> se-Yo or his sheep נִדָּחִ֔ים <WH5080> nid-da-Chim, go astray וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <WH5956> ve-hit-'al-lam-Ta and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> me-Hem; you הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> ha-Shev thyself from them thou shalt in any case תְּשִׁיבֵ֖ם <WH7725> te-shi-Vem bring them again לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> le-'a-Chi-cha. unto thy brother

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- If לֹ֨א <WH3808> lo is not קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> ka-Rov [be] not nigh אָחִ֛יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha And if thy brother אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יְדַעְתּ֑וֹ <WH3045> ye-da'-To; unto thee or if thou know וַאֲסַפְתּוֹ֙ <WH622> va-'a-saf-To him not then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> Toch it unto בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> bei-Te-cha, thine own house וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall remain עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha, you עַ֣ד <WH5704> 'ad until דְּרֹ֤שׁ <WH1875> de-Rosh seek אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha and it shall be with thee until thy brother אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, וַהֲשֵׁבֹת֖וֹ <WH7725> va-ha-she-vo-To after it and thou shalt restore it to him again לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְכֵ֧ן <WH3651> ve-Chen In like manner תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou do לַחֲמֹר֗וֹ <WH2543> la-cha-mo-Ro, with his ass וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> ve-Chen the same תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh and so shalt thou do לְשִׂמְלָתוֹ֒ <WH8071> le-sim-la-To with his raiment וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> ve-Chen likewise תַּעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou do לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol anything אֲבֵדַ֥ת <WH9> 'a-ve-Dat and with all lost thing אָחִ֛יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha of thy brother's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which תֹּאבַ֥ד <WH6> to-Vad which he hath lost מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu and you וּמְצָאתָ֑הּ <WH4672> u-me-tza-Tah; and thou hast found לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> tu-Chal likewise thou mayest לְהִתְעַלֵּֽם׃ <WH5956> le-hit-'al-Lem. not hide ס sa-Mek

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <WH7200> tir-'Eh Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲמ֨וֹר <WH2543> cha-Mor ass אָחִ֜יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother's א֤וֹ <WH176> o or שׁוֹרוֹ֙ <WH7794> sho-Ro or his ox נֹפְלִ֣ים <WH5307> no-fe-Lim fall down בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> bad-De-rech, by the way וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <WH5956> ve-hit-'al-lam-Ta and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> me-Hem; you הָקֵ֥ם <WH6965> ha-Kem thyself from them thou shalt surely תָּקִ֖ים <WH6965> ta-Kim help him to lift [them] up again עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> im-Mo. with ס sa-Mek

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh wear כְלִי־ <WH3627> che-li- shall not wear that which pertaineth גֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> ge-ver unto a man עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah, The woman וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor יִלְבַּ֥שׁ <WH3847> yil-Bash put גֶּ֖בֶר <WH1397> Ge-ver neither shall a man שִׂמְלַ֣ת <WH8071> sim-Lat garment אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah; on a woman's כִּ֧י <WH3588> ki for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <WH8441> to-'a-Vat [are] abomination יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever עֹ֥שֵׂה <WH6213> 'O-seh for all that do אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> 'El-leh. so פ Peh

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki If יִקָּרֵ֣א <WH7122> yik-ka-Re chance קַן־ <WH7064> kan- nest צִפּ֣וֹר׀ <WH6833> tzip-Por If a bird's לְפָנֶ֡יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha to be before בַּדֶּ֜רֶךְ <WH1870> bad-De-rech thee in the way בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol any עֵ֣ץ׀ <WH6086> 'etz in any tree א֣וֹ <WH176> o or עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, or on the ground אֶפְרֹחִים֙ <WH667> 'ef-ro-Chim [whether they be] young ones א֣וֹ <WH176> o or בֵיצִ֔ים <WH1000> vei-Tzim, or eggs וְהָאֵ֤ם <WH517> ve-ha-'Em and the dam רֹבֶ֙צֶת֙ <WH7257> ro-Ve-tzet sitting עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הָֽאֶפְרֹחִ֔ים <WH667> ha-'ef-ro-Chim, upon the young א֖וֹ <WH176> o or עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַבֵּיצִ֑ים <WH1000> hab-bei-Tzim; or upon the eggs לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> tik-Kach thou shalt not take הָאֵ֖ם <WH517> ha-'Em the dam עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with הַבָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> hab-ba-Nim. with the young

שַׁלֵּ֤חַ <WH7971> shal-Le-ach [But] thou shalt in any wise תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> te-shal-Lach go אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֵ֔ם <WH517> ha-'Em, let the dam וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַבָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> hab-ba-Nim the young תִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> tik-kach- and take לָ֑ךְ Lach; לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order יִ֣יטַב <WH3190> Yi-tav to thee that it may be well לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְהַאֲרַכְתָּ֖ <WH748> ve-ha-'a-rach-Ta with thee and [that] thou mayest prolong יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. [thy] days ס sa-Mek

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki When תִבְנֶה֙ <WH1129> tiv-Neh When thou buildest בַּ֣יִת <WH1004> Ba-yit house חָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> cha-Dash, a new וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta then thou shalt make מַעֲקֶ֖ה <WH4624> ma-'a-Keh a battlement לְגַגֶּ֑ךָ <WH1406> le-gag-Ge-cha; for thy roof וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- you will not תָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> ta-Sim that thou bring דָּמִים֙ <WH1818> da-Mim not blood בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> be-vei-Te-cha, upon thine house כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- if יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> yip-Pol if any man הַנֹּפֵ֖ל <WH5307> han-no-Fel fall מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. at ס sa-Mek

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִזְרַ֥ע <WH2232> tiz-Ra' Thou shalt not sow כַּרְמְךָ֖ <WH3754> kar-me-Cha thy vineyard כִּלְאָ֑יִם <WH3610> kil-'A-yim; with divers seeds פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or תִּקְדַּ֗שׁ <WH6942> tik-Dash, be defiled הַֽמְלֵאָ֤ה <WH4395> ham-le-'Ah lest the fruit הַזֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> haz-Ze-ra' of thy seed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּזְרָ֔ע <WH2232> tiz-Ra', which thou hast sown וּתְבוּאַ֖ת <WH8393> u-te-vu-'At and the fruit הַכָּֽרֶם׃ <WH3754> hak-Ka-rem. of thy vineyard ס sa-Mek

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תַחֲרֹ֥שׁ <WH2790> ta-cha-Rosh Thou shalt not plow בְּשׁוֹר־ <WH7794> be-shor- with an ox וּבַחֲמֹ֖ר <WH2543> u-va-cha-Mor and an ass יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> yach-Dav. together ס sa-Mek

לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo shall not תִלְבַּשׁ֙ <WH3847> til-Bash Thou shalt not wear שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <WH8162> sha-'at-Nez, a garment of divers sorts צֶ֥מֶר <WH6785> Tze-mer [as] of woollen וּפִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6593> u-fish-Tim and linen יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> yach-Dav. together ס sa-Mek

גְּדִלִ֖ים <WH1434> ge-di-Lim thee fringes תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ta-'a-seh- Thou shalt make לָּ֑ךְ Lach; עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' upon the four כַּנְפ֥וֹת <WH3671> kan-Fot quarters כְּסוּתְךָ֖ <WH3682> ke-su-te-Cha of thy vesture אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תְּכַסֶּה־ <WH3680> te-chas-seh- wherewith thou coverest בָּֽהּ׃ Bah. ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- If יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> yik-Kach take אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish If any man אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah; a wife וּבָ֥א <WH935> u-Va and go in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-ha about וּשְׂנֵאָֽהּ׃ <WH8130> u-se-ne-'Ah. unto her and hate

וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> ve-Sam And give לָהּ֙ lah עֲלִילֹ֣ת <WH5949> 'a-li-Lot occasions דְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> de-va-Rim, of speech וְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> ve-ho-Tzi against her and bring up עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha and שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem name רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; an evil וְאָמַ֗ר <WH559> ve-'a-Mar, upon her and say אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah this woman הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> haz-zoT I לָקַ֔חְתִּי <WH3947> la-Kach-ti, I took וָאֶקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> va-'ek-Rav and when I came אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-ha, about וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> ma-Tza-ti to her I found לָ֖הּ lah בְּתוּלִֽים׃ <WH1331> be-tu-Lim. her not a maid

וְלָקַ֛ח <WH3947> ve-la-Kach take אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi Then shall the father; הַנַּעַר han-na-'ar כהַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <WH5291> han-na-'a-Rah damsel קוְאִמָּ֑הּ <WH517> ve-'im-Mah; and her mother וְהוֹצִ֜יאוּ <WH3318> ve-ho-Tzi-'u and bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּתוּלֵ֧י <WH1331> be-tu-Lei virginity; הַנַּעַר han-na-'ar כהַֽנַּעֲרָ֛ה <WH5291> han-na-'a-Rah damsel קאֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> zik-Nei unto the elders הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city הַשָּֽׁעְרָה׃ <WH8179> hash-Sha-'e-rah. in the gate

וְאָמַ֛ר <WH559> ve-'a-Mar shall say אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi father; הַנַּעַר han-na-'ar כהַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <WH5291> han-na-'a-Rah damsel קאֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַזְּקֵנִ֑ים <WH2205> haz-ze-ke-Nim; unto the elders אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּתִּ֗י <WH1323> bit-Ti, my daughter נָתַ֜תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti I gave לָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> la-'Ish unto this man הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh to this לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> le-'ish-Shah to wife וַיִּשְׂנָאֶֽהָ׃ <WH8130> vai-yis-na-'E-ha. and he hateth

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold ה֡וּא <WH1931> hu he שָׂם֩ <WH7760> sam And lo he hath given עֲלִילֹ֨ת <WH5949> 'a-li-Lot occasions דְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> de-va-Rim of speech לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, [against her] saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> ma-Tza-ti I found לְבִתְּךָ֙ <WH1323> le-vit-te-Cha not thy daughter בְּתוּלִ֔ים <WH1331> be-tu-Lim, a maid וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh this בְּתוּלֵ֣י <WH1331> be-tu-Lei virginity בִתִּ֑י <WH1323> vit-Ti; and yet these [are the tokens of] my daughter's וּפָֽרְשׂוּ֙ <WH6566> u-fa-re-Su And they shall spread הַשִּׂמְלָ֔ה <WH8071> has-sim-Lah, the cloth לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> zik-Nei the elders הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. of the city

וְלָֽקְח֛וּ <WH3947> ve-la-ke-Chu shall take זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> zik-Nei And the elders הָֽעִיר־ <WH5892> ha-'ir- of that city הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv he אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish; that man וְיִסְּר֖וּ <WH3256> ve-yis-se-Ru and chastise אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

וְעָנְשׁ֨וּ <WH6064> ve-'a-ne-Shu And they shall amerce אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> o-To מֵ֣אָה <WH3967> Me-'ah him in an hundred כֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> Che-sef, [shekels] of silver וְנָתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu and give לַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> la-'a-Vi [them] unto the father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <WH5291> han-na-'a-Rah, of the damsel כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki because הוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> ho-Tzi because he hath brought up שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem name רָ֔ע <WH7451> Ra', an evil עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and בְּתוּלַ֣ת <WH1330> be-tu-Lat upon a virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְלֽוֹ־ ve-lov- תִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh shall remain לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> le-'ish-Shah, and she shall be his wife לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> yu-Chal he may לְשַׁלְּחָ֖הּ <WH7971> le-shal-le-Chah not put her away כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- her all יָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> ya-Mav. all his days ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> 'e-Met be true הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> ha-Yah, become הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var But if this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- was not נִמְצְא֥וּ <WH4672> nim-tze-'U be not found בְתוּלִ֖ים <WH1331> ve-tu-Lim [and the tokens of] virginity; לַנַּעַר lan-na-'ar כלַֽנַּעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5291> Lan-na-'a-Rah. damsel ק
